We want to turn: (select (icmp eq (and X, C1), 0), Y, (BinOp Y, C2)) into: IF C2 u&gt;= C1 (BinOp Y, (shl (and X, C1), C3)) ELSE (BinOp Y, (lshr (and X, C1), C3)) iff: 0 on the RHS is the identity value (i.e add, xor, shl, etc...) C1 and C2 are both powers of 2 where: IF C2 u&gt;= C1 C3 = Log(C2) - Log(C1) ELSE C3 = Log(C1) - Log(C2) <a href="#ad51f65187d4c6b69d6bf8f71e027e4de">More...</a>

### foldSelectICmpAnd() {#afcb58333497c40468d7889705a5d0b03}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static Value &#42; foldSelectICmpAnd (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectinst">SelectInst</a> &amp; Sel, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/icmpinst">ICmpInst</a> &#42; Cmp, InstCombiner::BuilderTy &amp; Builder)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
This folds: select (icmp eq (and X, C1)), TC, FC iff C1 is a power 2 and the difference between TC and FC is a power-of-2.

To something like: (shr (and (X, C1)), (log2(C1) - log2(TC-FC))) + FC Or: (shl (and (X, C1)), (log2(TC-FC) - log2(C1))) + FC With some variations depending if FC is larger than TC, or the shift isn&#39;t needed, or the bit widths don&#39;t match.

Definition at line <a href="#l00122">122</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/instcombine/instcombineselect-cpp">InstCombineSelect.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### foldSelectICmpAndAnd() {#a53cf44ef1c7130fc18add1138c045484}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static Instruction &#42; foldSelectICmpAndAnd (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42; SelType, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/icmpinst">ICmpInst</a> &#42; Cmp, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; TVal, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; FVal, InstCombiner::BuilderTy &amp; Builder)</>}

We want to turn: (select (icmp eq (and X, Y), 0), (and (lshr X, Z), 1), 1) into: zext (icmp ne i32 (and X, (or Y, (shl 1, Z))), 0) Note: Z may be 0 if lshr is missing.

Worst-case scenario is that we will replace 5 instructions with 5 different instructions, but we got rid of select.

### foldSelectICmpAndBinOp() {#ad51f65187d4c6b69d6bf8f71e027e4de}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static Value &#42; foldSelectICmpAndBinOp (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/icmpinst">ICmpInst</a> &#42; IC, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; TrueVal, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; FalseVal, InstCombiner::BuilderTy &amp; Builder)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
We want to turn: (select (icmp eq (and X, C1), 0), Y, (BinOp Y, C2)) into: IF C2 u&gt;= C1 (BinOp Y, (shl (and X, C1), C3)) ELSE (BinOp Y, (lshr (and X, C1), C3)) iff: 0 on the RHS is the identity value (i.e add, xor, shl, etc...) C1 and C2 are both powers of 2 where: IF C2 u&gt;= C1 C3 = Log(C2) - Log(C1) ELSE C3 = Log(C1) - Log(C2)

This transform handles cases where:
<ul>
<li>The icmp predicate is inverted</li>
<li>The select operands are reversed</li>
<li>The magnitude of C2 and C1 are flipped</li>
</ul>

</MemberDefinition>

We want to turn code that looks like this: C = or A, B D = select cond, C, A into: C = select cond, B, 0 D = or A, C.

Assuming that the specified instruction is an operand to the select, return a bitmask indicating which operands of this instruction are foldable if they equal the other incoming value of the select.

TC : FC;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we would need to create an &#39;and&#39; + &#39;shift&#39; + &#39;xor&#39; to replace a &#39;select&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CreateAnd &amp;&amp; ShouldNotVal &amp;&amp; ValZeros != AndZeros)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><Highlight kind="comment">/// We want to turn code that looks like this:</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %C = select %cond, %B, 0</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><Highlight kind="comment">/// We want to turn:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"><Highlight kind="comment">///   (select (icmp eq (and X, C1), 0), Y, (BinOp Y, C2))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><Highlight kind="comment">/// into:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"><Highlight kind="comment">///   IF C2 u&gt;= C1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="729"><Highlight kind="comment">///     (BinOp Y, (shl (and X, C1), C3))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"><Highlight kind="comment">///   ELSE</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><Highlight kind="comment">///     (BinOp Y, (lshr (and X, C1), C3))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><Highlight kind="comment">/// iff:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><Highlight kind="comment">///   0 on the RHS is the identity value (i.e add, xor, shl, etc...)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><Highlight kind="comment">///   C1 and C2 are both powers of 2</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><Highlight kind="comment">/// where:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><Highlight kind="comment">///   IF C2 u&gt;= C1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><Highlight kind="comment">///     C3 = Log(C2) - Log(C1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><Highlight kind="comment">///   ELSE</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><Highlight kind="comment">///     C3 = Log(C1) - Log(C2)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This transform handles cases where:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 1 The icmp predicate is inverted</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 2 The select operands are reversed</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 3 The magnitude of C2 and C1 are flipped</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745" lineLink="#ad51f65187d4c6b69d6bf8f71e027e4de"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="#ad51f65187d4c6b69d6bf8f71e027e4de">foldSelectICmpAndBinOp</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/icmpinst">ICmpInst</a> &#42;IC, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;TrueVal,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><Highlight kind="normal">                                  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;FalseVal,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"><Highlight kind="normal">                                  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombiner/#a19c4df37b96c2a73991556b696924584">InstCombiner::BuilderTy</a> &amp;Builder) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Only handle integer compares. Also, if this is a vector select, we need a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// vector compare.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1173"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Attempt to fold a cttz/ctlz followed by a icmp plus select into a single</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1184"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %0 = tail call i32 @llvm.cttz.i32(i32 %x, i1 false)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1313"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If we have a select with an equality comparison, then we know the value in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1314"><Highlight kind="comment">/// one of the arms of the select. See if substituting this value into an arm</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1315"><Highlight kind="comment">/// and simplifying the result yields the same value as the other arm.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1316"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1317"><Highlight kind="comment">/// To make this transform safe, we must drop poison-generating flags</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1318"><Highlight kind="comment">/// (nsw, etc) if we simplified to a binop because the select may be guarding</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1319"><Highlight kind="comment">/// that poison from propagating. If the existing binop already had no</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1320"><Highlight kind="comment">/// poison-generating flags, then this transform can be done by instsimplify.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1321"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1322"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Consider:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1323"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %cmp = icmp eq i32 %x, 2147483647</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1324"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %add = add nsw i32 %x, 1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1325"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %sel = select i1 %cmp, i32 -2147483648, i32 %add</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1326"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1327"><Highlight kind="comment">/// We can&#39;t replace %sel with %add unless we strip away the flags.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1328"><Highlight kind="comment">/// TODO: Wrapping flags could be preserved in some cases with better analysis.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1329"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instcombinerimpl/#a249045710b0ab9dbf38ac89353a05a3e">InstCombinerImpl::foldSelectValueEquivalence</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectinst">SelectInst</a> &amp;Sel,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1330"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst">CmpInst</a> &amp;Cmp) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1331"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Canonicalize the pattern to an equivalence on the predicate by swapping the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1332"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// select operands.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1333"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/tgtok/#abbc5259d649363016626e2529fabe0c5a58b95af1ca96e109f85a0646a05fceb7">TrueVal</a> = Sel.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectinst/#ae95a0fb83a1c98ce1aed74147c026db0">getTrueValue</a>(), &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/tgtok/#abbc5259d649363016626e2529fabe0c5aeb5a2908109c763377832cbb4726b6d4">FalseVal</a> = Sel.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectinst/#a1b39b0c7ce6162c1f4754a2862957185">getFalseValue</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1334"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Swapped = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1346"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Take care to avoid replacing X == Y ? X : Z with X == Y ? Y : Z, as that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1355"><Highlight kind="normal">                                          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">/&#42; AllowRefinement=&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1372"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Even if TrueVal does not simplify, we can directly replace a use of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1373"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// CmpLHS with CmpRHS, as long as the instruction is not used anywhere</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2349"><Highlight kind="normal">    NewSel = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a49b228f797f9b3563256da446100c3ac">CreateSelect</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a193847098793cdbab306803186676899">Cond</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, &amp;Sel);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2350"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (TSrc == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a> &amp;&amp; FSrc == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2351"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// select (cmp (bitcast C), (bitcast D)), (bitcast&#39; D), (bitcast&#39; C) --&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2352"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// bitcast (select (cmp A, B), B, A)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2353"><Highlight kind="normal">    NewSel = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a49b228f797f9b3563256da446100c3ac">CreateSelect</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a193847098793cdbab306803186676899">Cond</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, &amp;Sel);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2354"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2355"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2356"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2357"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">new</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitcastinst">BitCastInst</a>(NewSel, Sel.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2358"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2359"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2360"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Try to eliminate select instructions that test the returned flag of cmpxchg</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2361"><Highlight kind="comment">/// instructions.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2362"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2363"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If a select instruction tests the returned flag of a cmpxchg instruction and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2364"><Highlight kind="comment">/// selects between the returned value of the cmpxchg instruction its compare</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2365"><Highlight kind="comment">/// operand, the result of the select will always be equal to its false value.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2366"><Highlight kind="comment">/// For example:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2367"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2368"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %cmpxchg = cmpxchg ptr %ptr, i64 %compare, i64 %new&#95;value seq&#95;cst seq&#95;cst</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2369"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %val = extractvalue &#123; i64, i1 &#125; %cmpxchg, 0</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2370"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %success = extractvalue &#123; i64, i1 &#125; %cmpxchg, 1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2371"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %sel = select i1 %success, i64 %compare, i64 %val</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2372"><Highlight kind="comment">///   ret i64 %sel</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2373"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2374"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The returned value of the cmpxchg instruction (%val) is the original value</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2375"><Highlight kind="comment">/// located at %ptr prior to any update. If the cmpxchg operation succeeds, %val</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2376"><Highlight kind="comment">/// must have been equal to %compare. Thus, the result of the select is always</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2377"><Highlight kind="comment">/// equal to %val, and the code can be simplified to:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2378"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2379"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %cmpxchg = cmpxchg ptr %ptr, i64 %compare, i64 %new&#95;value seq&#95;cst seq&#95;cst</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2380"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %val = extractvalue &#123; i64, i1 &#125; %cmpxchg, 0</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2381"><Highlight kind="comment">///   ret i64 %val</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2382"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2383"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;foldSelectCmpXchg(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectinst">SelectInst</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2384"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A helper that determines if V is an extractvalue instruction whose</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2385"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// aggregate operand is a cmpxchg instruction and whose single index is equal</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2386"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to I. If such conditions are true, the helper returns the cmpxchg</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2387"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instruction; otherwise, a nullptr is returned.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2388"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> isExtractFromCmpXchg = &#91;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea5206560a306a2e085a437fd258eb57ce">V</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) -&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/atomiccmpxchginst">AtomicCmpXchgInst</a> &#42; &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2389"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Extract = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;ExtractValueInst&gt;</a>(V);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2390"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Extract)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2391"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2392"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Extract-&gt;getIndices()&#91;0&#93; != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2393"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2394"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;AtomicCmpXchgInst&gt;</a>(Extract-&gt;getAggregateOperand());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2395"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2396"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2397"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the select has a single user, and this user is a select instruction that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2398"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we can simplify, skip the cmpxchg simplification for now.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2399"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>.hasOneUse())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2400"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpuregbankselect-cpp/#a09bc27545df3b02401428427d0b5ce6f">Select</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;SelectInst&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>.user&#95;back()))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2401"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpuregbankselect-cpp/#a09bc27545df3b02401428427d0b5ce6f">Select</a>-&gt;getCondition() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>.getCondition())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2402"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpuregbankselect-cpp/#a09bc27545df3b02401428427d0b5ce6f">Select</a>-&gt;getFalseValue() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>.getTrueValue() ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2403"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpuregbankselect-cpp/#a09bc27545df3b02401428427d0b5ce6f">Select</a>-&gt;getTrueValue() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>.getFalseValue())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2404"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2405"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2406"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Ensure the select condition is the returned flag of a cmpxchg instruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2407"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;CmpXchg = isExtractFromCmpXchg(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>.getCondition(), 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2408"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!CmpXchg)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2409"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2410"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2411"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check the true value case: The true value of the select is the returned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2412"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// value of the same cmpxchg used by the condition, and the false value is the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2413"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// cmpxchg instruction&#39;s compare operand.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2414"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a> = isExtractFromCmpXchg(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>.getTrueValue(), 0))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2415"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a> == CmpXchg &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>-&gt;getCompareOperand() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>.getFalseValue())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2416"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>.getFalseValue();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2417"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2418"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check the false value case: The false value of the select is the returned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2419"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// value of the same cmpxchg used by the condition, and the true value is the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2420"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// cmpxchg instruction&#39;s compare operand.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2421"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a> = isExtractFromCmpXchg(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>.getFalseValue(), 0))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2422"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a> == CmpXchg &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>-&gt;getCompareOperand() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>.getTrueValue())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2423"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>.getFalseValue();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2425"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2427"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2428"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Try to reduce a funnel/rotate pattern that includes a compare and select</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2429"><Highlight kind="comment">/// into a funnel shift intrinsic. Example:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2430"><Highlight kind="comment">/// rotl32(a, b) --&gt; (b == 0 ? a : ((a &gt;&gt; (32 - b)) | (a &lt;&lt; b)))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2431"><Highlight kind="comment">///              --&gt; call llvm.fshl.i32(a, a, b)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2432"><Highlight kind="comment">/// fshl32(a, b, c) --&gt; (c == 0 ? a : ((b &gt;&gt; (32 - c)) | (a &lt;&lt; c)))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2433"><Highlight kind="comment">///                 --&gt; call llvm.fshl.i32(a, b, c)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2434"><Highlight kind="comment">/// fshr32(a, b, c) --&gt; (c == 0 ? b : ((a &gt;&gt; (32 - c)) | (b &lt;&lt; c)))</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2436"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;foldSelectFunnelShift(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectinst">SelectInst</a> &amp;Sel,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3426"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// pattern.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3430"><Highlight kind="normal">                                        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;ShouldDropNUW) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3431"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The challenge in recognizing std::bit&#95;ceil(X) is that the operand is used</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3432"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// for the CTLZ proper and select condition, each possibly with some</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3433"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// operation like add and sub.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3434"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3435"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Our aim is to make sure that -ctlz &amp; (BitWidth - 1) == 0 even when the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3436"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// select instruction would select 1, which allows us to get rid of the select</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3437"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3438"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3439"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// To see if we can do so, we do some symbolic execution with ConstantRange.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3440"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Specifically, we compute the range of values that Cond0 could take when</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3441"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Cond == false.  Then we successively transform the range until we obtain</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3442"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the range of values that CtlzOp could take.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3443"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3444"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Conceptually, we follow the def-use chain backward from Cond0 while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3445"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// transforming the range for Cond0 until we meet the common ancestor of Cond0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3446"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and CtlzOp.  Then we follow the def-use chain forward until we obtain the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3447"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// range for CtlzOp.  That said, we only follow at most one ancestor from</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3448"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Cond0.  Likewise, we only follow at most one ancestor from CtrlOp.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3449"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3450"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrange">ConstantRange</a> CR = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrange/#aa89e9cec92a0b38d2f47a077bf12cc98">ConstantRange::makeExactICmpRegion</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3451"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst/#aa2a54b545d237ecfe450fd1292f7675e">CmpInst::getInversePredicate</a>(Pred), &#42;Cond1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3452"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3453"><Highlight kind="normal">  ShouldDropNUW = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3454"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3455"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Match the operation that&#39;s used to compute CtlzOp from CommonAncestor.  If</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3456"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// CtlzOp == CommonAncestor, return true as no operation is needed.  If a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3457"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// match is found, execute the operation on CR, update CR, and return true.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3458"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Otherwise, return false.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3461"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CtlzOp == CommonAncestor)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3462"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3463"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a25d956d9e0beadd47ce4bc255dfa811d">match</a>(CtlzOp, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a062ccd76a126632721e9aa09775d6c0e">m&#95;Add</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a2d9861feadd3a09792967a012559e7b2">m&#95;Specific</a>(CommonAncestor), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#aac9e78b3aa02ec087c4621358f506718">m&#95;APInt</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>)))) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3464"><Highlight kind="normal">      CR = CR.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrange/#a04b4ad79ea8ce56e62e0e0323d302eec">add</a>(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3467"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a25d956d9e0beadd47ce4bc255dfa811d">match</a>(CtlzOp, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#af5c293ba602295963ee06dd6f22e6335">m&#95;Sub</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#aac9e78b3aa02ec087c4621358f506718">m&#95;APInt</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/patternmatch/#a2d9861feadd3a09792967a012559e7b2">m&#95;Specific</a>(CommonAncestor)))) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3468"><Highlight kind="normal">      ShouldDropNUW = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3469"><Highlight kind="normal">      CR = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrange">ConstantRange</a>(&#42;C).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantrange/#aeb57116b101c8d1263ff5ffdaccdcad0">sub</a>(CR);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3470"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3471"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
